divs: sighting detailsi was driving on i-95 north in ri at approximately 3:30 am on 10\12\2008. i had one passenger in the car who also witnessed the event. we saw what looked like a blinking\flashing white light plummet straight down from the sky. the light was much bigger than a star (maybe 5 times bigger than a star ��� it honestly looked like a light you���d see on a plane, but there was only one), and did not appear to be a meteor because there was no smoke trail or streak that we could see. the highway is lined with trees, so once it went behind the tree line we couldn���t see an impact, nor did we see a glow or fire that would possibly happen if it was a plane crash. we discussed it for a while (did you just see that?!?), and we thought it might have been a small plane that crashed ��� we were approaching west warwick ri, which is where tf greene airport is located. (as far as the airport goes ��� i travel this route often, mostly at night, and i am comfortably familiar with the planes that come and go from the airport. i have never witnessed anything that appeared to plummet before, and it was about 3:30 in the morning.) for the record, neither of us was drunk or impaired in any way. i checked the web as soon as i got home because we were convinced it was a plane crash but i couldn���t find any info. the road was pretty deserted, and the whole thing happened in maybe 5 seconds, but i���m really curious to see if anyone else saw something odd that night.
trends: There has been one other sighting in West Greenwich
There were no other sightings in West Greenwich on or around October 12th 2008
Summary: blinking light dropped out of the sky
